testcase.name: ShineReadsCruiseStagesCompletedFeed.scn
testcase.error:
Using Backdoor:

  • read Cruise stages feed

    • Verify stages and jobs are imported

    Using SPARQL Endpoint:

  • Verify resource at Cruise URI "stages/1.xml" is failed stage "name1" with counter "1"
  • Verify stage "stages/1.xml" has passed job "compile" with Cruise URI "jobs/1.xml"
  • Verify stage "stages/1.xml" has failed job "test" with Cruise URI "jobs/2.xml"
  • Verify resource at Cruise URI "stages/2.xml" is passed stage "name1" with counter "3"
  • Verify stage "stages/2.xml" has passed job "compile" with Cruise URI "jobs/3.xml"
  • Verify stage "stages/2.xml" has passed job "test" with Cruise URI "jobs/4.xml"

    • Verify a job's properties are imported

    Using SPARQL endpoint:

  • Verify job "jobs/1.xml" has Cruise property "cruise_job_id" with value "107"
  • Verify job "jobs/1.xml" has Cruise property "os" with value "OpenBSD"

    • Verify JUnit test cases are imported

    Using SPARQL endpoint:

  • Verify "jobs/1.xml" has no test cases
  • Verify "jobs/2.xml" has test suite "com.foobar.ATestSuite" with errored test case "test1"
  • Verify "jobs/2.xml" has test suite "com.foobar.ATestSuite" with passed test case "test2"
  • Verify "jobs/3.xml" has no test cases
  • Verify "jobs/4.xml" has test suite "com.foobar.ATestSuite" with passed test case "test1"
  • Verify "jobs/4.xml" has test suite "com.foobar.ATestSuite" with passed test case "test2"

    • Verify Artifacts are imported

    Using SPARQL Endpoint:

  • Verify no artifacts for "jobs/1.xml"
  • Find artifacts for "jobs/2.xml" at base dir "artifacts-base-dir/2" locatable at Cruise URL "artifacts"
  • Verify artifacts has "unit" artifact at "junit"
  • Verify no artifacts for "jobs/3.xml"
  • Find artifacts for "jobs/4.xml" at base dir "artifacts-base-dir/4" locatable at Cruise URL "artifacts"
  • Verify artifacts has "unit" artifact at "junit"
    • ShineReadsCruiseStagesCompletedFeed.scn:9 java.lang.RuntimeException: error message at com.thoughtworks.studios.shine.twist.UsingSPARQLEndpoint.verifyResourceAtCruiseURIIsFailedStageWithCounter(UsingSPARQLEndpoint.java:50)
